security: This report contains Peter K. Simons' personal information, including his service number, SSAN, DOB, POB, Alien Registration Number, address of family members, and details of his military and civilian employment history. Sharing this information could violate his privacy and potentially expose him or his family to risk.
summary: This agent report details the background investigation of Peter K. Simons, a Specialist 4 in the US Army, including his personal history, employment, education, and military service, conducted on October 5, 1967, to assess a possible sensitive desertion.
summary_one_paragraph: On October 5, 1967, an agent report was compiled on Peter K. Simons, a Specialist 4 in the US Army, to investigate a possible sensitive desertion. The report, created by William F. Mockler of the 501st MI Det (Armd Div), details Simons' personal information, including his German citizenship, family history, educational background, employment history in both Germany and the US, and his military service record, including promotions, assignments, and foreign service in Germany. The report notes his aptitude test scores, security clearance status, foreign travel history, and remarks about his lost identification card and authorized leave to Frankfurt-lain, Germany.
title: Agent Report
